title: [禮尚往來] 烏克蘭幫左我地咁多, 係咪應該到我地出下聲

replies.msg:
Free Hong Kong Center
https://www.facebook.com/ufhkc/photos/a.468815556801405/959384557744500/?type=3&theater

人地星期日會係Keiv 記念一個細佬
睇佢auto translate似係有個細路仔係上海死左比支那扣起左
人地會係Keiv為香港出聲, 香港會唔會為佢地出下聲?

Прийдіть на Акція пам'яті Івана Лю

7 вересня 2019 року, у Шанхаї, 13-річний громадянин України, Іван Лю, здійснив самогубство, вистрибнувши з 13 поверха, де знаходилася батьківська квартира. На його руці було написано: «Жертва шанхайської освіти».

Протягом декількох років над хлопцем жорсткого знущався класний керівник, 30-річний Чжан Сяо Цюнь, з відверто неонацистськими поглядами. Він привселюдно принижував підлітка, бив, душив та навіть підірвав вухо. На уроках «учитель» с... See more
Come to Акція пам'яті Ívana Lû

On September 7, 2019, in Shanghai, a 13-Year-old citizen of Ukraine, Ivan Liu, fulfilled suicide, vistribnuvši from 13 poverha, where the His hand was written, "the victim of šanhajsʹkoí̈ education".

For several years over the guy, the rugged was victimized by an awesome manager, 30-Year-Old Zhang Xiao Cûnʹ, with He roadie a teenager, beaten, choking and even blew his ear. In the lessons "teacher" and Hitler's actions and fasted on social networks. A teenager he called "nedolûdinoû", indicating his Ukrainian, i.e. low, origin. Every time he was practicing: "get in your Ukraine".

On the day of the death of John, the awesome manager deleted the mother of the child from the group of the parent committee that suggests terrible events The note boy didn't leave.

The police refused to hold the inscriptions on the hands of the dead. Over 10 days, the body was held in the morgue and answered the death reference until the parents agree to withdraw all the charges from the teacher The Director of the school refused to release and even punish the thief, at the time when the pravoohoroní organs and lawyers refuse to lead the Parents even prohibition to spend a goodbye dinner at school with friends of the dead.

More than that, it's not the first case of children's suicide in this shanghai school.

The Ukrainian consulate is trying to change the situation, but it is currently everything. The Official Kiev does not react to proof to the suicide of his offender citizen and does not help to investigate this crime

We ask all ukrainians and friends of Ukraine to come to the share of the memory of the 13-Year-old John Liu and light a Until the last minute, he tried to fight with a creature of a represivnoû car in his school, however, the system, unfortunately, won

Let's let us know the government of the PRC who does everything to make criminals remain on the outside that Ukraine sees everything.

13 October, 15:30, Embassy of PRC in Ukraine

With yourself brothers candles and cry " we will not forget ", " Ukraine requires justice " etc.
·
Rate this translation
